rooms.name: Crying
rooms.description:
There's blood on the west wall. You hear faint crying to the north. It sounds human.
There are exits to the north, east, south, and west.

rooms.name: Red Circle Room
rooms.description:
There's a red circle on the wall.
There are exits to the east and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, south, and west.

rooms.name: Red room
rooms.description: You enter into a room lit entirely by red lights.

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.description:
You enter into a corporate cafeteria. One flickering light is all that allows you to see. You see a faint glimmer in the corner.
There are exits to the north and west.
